https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cqBitTw7KTmkxWf3K8qiHh1NBVB.jpg A samurai Sakunosuke gets an order from clan chamberlain to kill another samurai who is married with his own younger sister. As a loyal samurai he has to accept the mission even though he has inner conflicts. At River's Edge
